taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Polygonaceae;subfamily Eriogonoideae;genus Eriogonum;species pharnaceoides;variety pharnaceoides;

bio:treatment.discussion: Variety pharnaceoides is found infrequently throughout its range in northern and eastern Arizona (Apache, Cochise, Coconino, Gila, Graham, Greenlee, Mohave, Navajo, Pima, Pinal, Santa Cruz, and Yavapai counties) and western New Mexico (Catron, Grant, Hidalgo, Luna, Sierra, Socorro, and Taos counties). Thurber (773, NY) gathered the only known collection from Mexico at Janos, Chihuahua, in 1852.
